staff.title: Raymond - Private Equity Expert
staff.description: Experienced private equity manager and portfolio management specialist bringing real-world Wall Street expertise to SCISS students.

seo.metaTitle: Raymond - Private Equity Expert | SCISS Faculty
seo.metaDescription: Learn from Raymond, experienced Private Equity Manager with Tati NY, Inc and former Portfolio Manager at Spirit of America Investment Funds.

staff.bio: Raymond brings extensive experience in private equity and portfolio management to SCISS students. As a Private Equity Manager with Tati NY, Inc and former Portfolio Manager at Spirit of America Investment Funds, he provides real-world insights into investment strategies and financial markets.

experience.description: Managing private equity investments and portfolio optimization strategies
Led portfolio management for diversified investment funds

achievements: Consistently delivered above-market returns in private equity investments
Mentored numerous students in investment principles

staff.title: Frank - Wharton Alumnus & CEO
staff.description: Wharton-educated entrepreneur and CEO with extensive alternative investment and Wall Street experience.

seo.metaTitle: Frank - Wharton Alumnus & CEO | SCISS Leadership
seo.metaDescription: Learn from Frank, Wharton alumnus, Founder of Ancilla Capital Advisors and CEO of Atrata Inc, bringing Wall Street expertise to students.

staff.bio: Frank combines his Wharton education with real-world entrepreneurial success as Founder of Ancilla Capital Advisors and CEO of Atrata Inc. His extensive Wall Street experience provides students with insider knowledge of alternative investments and business strategy.

experience.description: Leading strategic operations and business development initiatives
Founded and developed alternative investment advisory firm

achievements: Successfully founded and scaled multiple companies

staff.title: Jonathan - AI Innovation Expert
staff.description: NYU and Johns Hopkins alumnus, founder of YEFA AI Innovation, and former Wall Street expert bringing cutting-edge AI knowledge to students.

seo.metaTitle: Jonathan - AI Innovation Expert | SCISS Technology Faculty
seo.metaDescription: Learn from Jonathan, NYU and Johns Hopkins alumnus, founder of YEFA AI Innovation, combining Wall Street experience with AI expertise.

staff.bio: Jonathan brings a unique combination of prestigious academic background from NYU and Johns Hopkins, entrepreneurial success as founder of YEFA AI Innovation, and practical Wall Street experience to guide students through the complexities of artificial intelligence and technology innovation.

experience.description: Leading AI innovation and development projects
Provided technology solutions for financial institutions

staff.title: Angelene - Yale Alumna & CEO
staff.description: Yale alumna, Founder & CEO of Alliance for Impact, and former Wall Street expert specializing in academic program development and international education.

seo.metaTitle: Angelene - Yale Alumna & CEO | SCISS Academic Leadership
seo.metaDescription: Learn from Angelene, Yale alumna, Founder & CEO of Alliance for Impact, expert in academic program development and international education.

staff.bio: Angelene combines her Yale education with entrepreneurial leadership as Founder & CEO of Alliance for Impact. Her extensive experience in academic program development and international education, along with her Wall Street background, makes her instrumental in shaping SCISS's educational excellence.

experience.description: Leading impact-driven educational and investment initiatives
Provided strategic investment and educational program guidance

staff.title: Satya - Former UN Assistant Secretary General
staff.description: Global education leader, Founder & CEO of Global Alliance, and former UN Assistant Secretary General bringing international perspective to academic excellence.

seo.metaTitle: Satya - Former UN Assistant Secretary General | SCISS Global Advisor
seo.metaDescription: Learn from Satya, former UN Assistant Secretary General and Founder & CEO of Global Alliance, expert in international education and global affairs.

staff.bio: Satya brings unparalleled international experience as former UN Assistant Secretary General and current Founder & CEO of Global Alliance. Her global perspective and expertise in international education policy help shape SCISS programs to meet world-class standards.

experience.description: Leading global educational and development initiatives
Led international education and development programs

achievements: Served at highest levels of international education policy

staff.title: Sophia Shi - CEO of Ivy Compass
staff.description: Educational excellence expert, CEO of Ivy Compass and Managing Partner of Stone Bridge Consulting, specializing in academic program development and student success.

seo.metaTitle: Sophia Shi - CEO of Ivy Compass | SCISS Academic Excellence Advisor
seo.metaDescription: Learn from Sophia Shi, CEO of Ivy Compass and Managing Partner of Stone Bridge Consulting, expert in academic excellence and student success.

staff.bio: Sophia Shi combines her leadership as CEO of Ivy Compass with her role as Managing Partner of Stone Bridge Consulting to bring exceptional expertise in academic program development and student success strategies to SCISS students and families.

experience.description: Leading educational consulting and student success initiatives
Managing strategic consulting for educational institutions

achievements: Successfully guided hundreds of students to top universities
